featured.text: Hence, the wind phone allows Sasaki to create a one- way conversation with deep, soulful personal meaning, and renders the grieving process more 27 for him.
As she sang, Whitfield’s voice was so powerful and soulful that everyone in the room forgot the wheelchair was even there.

definition.zh_def: 充滿靈魂的；感情深厚的
definition.en_def: Having or showing deep feeling or emotion.
definition.example: Her soulful voice captivated the audience.
